content: ***gnome gift card holder and ornament pattern*** this pattern is available for free on my blog or purchase the ad-free printer friendly pdf for a small fee free crochet pattern published on my blog https //greenfoxfarmsdesigns com/gnome-gift-card-holder-free-crochet-pattern ✦ gnome gift card holders work up quickly ✦ these are great for gifting cash or gift cards ✦ add the optional simple hanger to create an ornament ✦ quick pattern is great for craft sales ✦ makes an amazing and unique gift for anyone ✦ cute cottagecore pattern for the holidays --> this is an intermediate crochet pattern with a fair amount of sewing and one advanced stitch click here to join my vip facebook community for exclusive discounts cals giveaways and more --> **join the fb group ** 1 **what is included ** 7 page pdf pattern in us english with american crochet terms your pattern is available to download from your ravelry purchases and an email will be sent with a download link as well **size ** 5 tall x 4 wide **materials ** worsted/aran 4 yarn 45 - 65 yards total 20 - 25 yds hat color 20 - 25 yds beard color less than 5 yds skin color scrap g/6 4 0/4 25 mm hook for gnome parts yarn needle scissors stitch markers optional **stitch key ** slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet treble_crochet - treble_crochet decrease - single_crochet decrease by single_crochet 2 sts together sc3tog - single_crochet decrease by single_crochet 3 sts together ***green fox farms designs original crochet pattern *** i am here to help if you have any questions feel free to send me a message through my blog or social media fb & ig links below this pattern has been thoroughly tested and tech edited this pattern is my intellectual property you are welcome to make as many as you like sell them give them away etc you may not sell or alter and claim as your own this pattern this pattern may not be mass produced it is for individual use only you may not use my photographs if you want to share this pattern online you must only share a link to my blog you may not copy and paste my text / the pattern to another site thank you for respecting my work thank you lisa fox **my website and blog with other *free* patterns ** www greenfoxfarmsdesigns com/ **find me on etsy ** https //www etsy com/shop/greenfoxfarms follow me i share updates photos and occasional giveaways and sales on my social media pages come join the fun https //www instagram com/greenfoxfarms/ https //www facebook com/greenfoxfarms/ 1 https //www facebook com/greenfoxfarmsdesings
